content.text: APHA are seeking two external board members to join their APHA Science Advisory Board (SAB). This is an exciting opportunity to work with, challenge and support senior scientists within the APHA Science Directorate in delivering new research to inform strategy, policy and customer objectives, and achieving value for money.

We are seeking to attract high calibre applicants from a range of diverse backgrounds (including but not limited to academia, industry, and other science organisations) who can discharge the full range of committee responsibilities.
Board members are employed for a fixed term of up to three years, with a commitment of approximately 10 days a year, on a fee-based basis.
For full details of the role and how to apply please email ScienceRecruitment@apha.gov.uk.
